pr_title: Update static analysis image to include java 8 and 11 runtimes.

timeline.message: Update static analysis image to include java 8 and 11 runtimes.

timeline.bodyText: The static analysis check doesn't use this: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/java-docs-samples/blob/master/.kokoro/tests/run_static_analysis.sh
timeline.author: kurtisvg

replies.bodyText: Maven uses this though doesn't it?
replies.author: dzlier-gcp

replies.bodyText: Or I guess static analysis doesn't run any mvn commands.
replies.author: dzlier-gcp

replies.bodyText:
Maven doesn't, there is something in the other script we used to control which versions are run:

  
    
      java-docs-samples/.kokoro/tests/run_tests.sh
    
    
        Lines 159 to 164
      in
      a683a73
    
    
    
    

        
          
           # Skip tests that don't have the correct Java version. 
        

        
          
           # shellcheck disable=SC2076 
        

        
          
           if ! [[ ",$JAVA_VERSION," =~ ",$POM_JAVA," ]]; then 
        

        
          
               echo -e "\n Skipping tests: Java version ($POM_JAVA) not required ($JAVA_VERSION)\n" 
        

        
          
               continue 
        

        
          
           fi
replies.author: kurtisvg

timeline.message: Update static analysis image to include java 8 and 11 runtimes.
